name: postybirb-plus
description: PostyBirb is an application that helps artists post art and other multimedia to multiple websites more quickly..

scripts.build: npm run build:common && yarn run build:ui && yarn run build:app
scripts.build:app: cd electron-app && npm install && yarn run build
scripts.build:common: cd commons && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:ui: cd ui && npm install && yarn run build
scripts.release:windows: node create-signer.js &&  yarn run build && cd electron-app && yarn run release:windows
scripts.release:linux: node create-signer.js &&  yarn run build && cd electron-app && yarn run release:linux

author: Michael DiCarlo
